data.text: Mixi ɲaaxie luma nɛ gaaxui kui,
Mangɛ die wuya ɲama matandila ya ma,
Setare naxan a boore setaree tɔɔrɔma,
Sɛriyɛ matandi mixi ɲaaxi matɔxɔma nɛ,
Mixi ɲaaxie mu sɛriyɛ kolon,
Setare tinxinxi fisa banna tinxintare bɛ.
Sɛriyɛ batula findixi di xaxili fanyi nan na,
Mixi naxan a xa naafuli xun masama riba ra,
Mixi naxan tondima a tuli matide sɛriyɛ ra,
Mixi naxan tinxintɔɛe ratantanma,
Banna mixi ɲɔxɔ a ma a xa lɔnni gbo,
Tinxintɔɛe xun na rakeli, ɲama ɲɛlɛxinma nɛ,
Mixi naxan a xa yunubie nɔxunma, a xa fe mu sɔɔnɛyama,
Sɛɛwɛ na mixi bɛ naxan gaaxuma Ala ya ra,
Mixi ɲaaxi naxan ɲama setare yamarima,
Mangɛ xaxilitare mixi tɔɔrɔma nɛ,
Mixi naxan a kolon a bɔɲɛ kui a faxɛ tixi,
Mixi naxan ɲɛrɛma tinxinyi ra, na kisima nɛ,
Mixi naxan a xa bɔxi rawalima, na baloe sɔtɔma nɛ,
Mixi dugutɛgɛxi barakɛ sɔtɔma nɛ,
A mu lan mixi xa mixi rafisa a boore bɛ,
Milante gbatama bannaya ra,
Mixi naxan marasi xɔrɔxɔɛ fima mixi nde ma,
Mixi naxan a baba nun a nga muɲama,
Mixi naxan milama harige ma,
Mixi naxan laxi a yɛtɛ kan xaxili ra,
Mixi naxan setare kima, na mu tɔɔrɔma,
Mixi ɲaaxie xun na rakeli, ɲama a nɔxunma nɛ,
